casebody.data:
William SHANNON, M.D.
v.
Bob TESTEN, Joseph P. Jordan, and North Carolina Physicians Health Program, Inc. No. 372P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Tobias S. Hampson, Raleigh, for Shannon, William (M.D.). Michael E. Weddington, Raleigh, for Testen, Bob, et al. Robert E. Desmond, Raleigh. Ginger B. Hunsucker, Raleigh, for Testen, Bob, et al. Beth R. Fleishman, Raleigh. Jaye E. Bingham-Hinch.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 10th of November 2015 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
